title: Keycloak 23.0.5 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   BUGS   * Operator CSV uses wrong format for `createdAt` field operator  * Keycloak UI meets "Internal Sever Error" after save "Refresh Token Max Reuse"    number core  * Unable to modify access token lifespan at realm level. Keycloak stops    working. core
